DIME Beauty Luminosity Eye Serum

Brand: DIME

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water/Aqua, Organic Aloe Vera Juice, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Cucumis Sativus Extract, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Squalane, Camellia Seed Oil, DL-Panthenol, Carbomer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Caffeine,

Niacinamide, Squalane, Camellia Seed Oil, DL-Panthenol, Carbomer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Caffeine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Malus Domestica Fruit Stem Cell Extract, Argania Spinosa Sprout Stem Cell Extract, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate,

Caprylyl Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Caffeine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Malus Domestica Fruit Stem Cell Extract, Argania Spinosa Sprout Stem Cell Extract, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Acetyl Tetrapeptide, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Vitamin E Mixed Tocopherols, Sodium Hydroxide

Directions: Apply in the morning and evening after cleansing your face with the DIME Gentle Jelly Cleanser, after applying facial serums, and after applying moisturizers. For best results, apply every day.
